DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n Convert(varchar, T.TransactionDateTime, 20) as TransactionDateTime,§§n S.SaleCode as PNR,§§n L.AccountCode as LocationCode,§§n L.DisplayName as LocationName,§§n OA.AccountCode as OpAreaCode,§§n OA.DisplayName as OpAreaName,§§n W.WorkstationCode,§§n W.WorkstationName,§§n Convert(varchar, T.TransactionFiscalDate, 103) as FiscalDate,§§n T.TransactionSerial as TransactionSerial,§§n T.PaidAmount as TransactionAmount,§§n P.PaymentAmount as PaymentAmount,§§n Coalesce(Plg.PluginName, Drv.DriverName) as PaymentMethod§§nfrom§§n tbTransaction T inner join§§n tbSale S on S.SaleId=T.SaleId inner join§§n tbWorkstation W on W.WorkstationId=T.WorkstationId inner join§§n tbAccount OA on OA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId inner join§§n tbAccount L on L.AccountId=OA.ParentAccountId inner join§§n tbPayment P on P.TransactionId=T.TransactionId inner join§§n tbPlugin Plg on Plg.PluginId=P.PluginId inner join§§n tbDriver Drv on Drv.DriverId=Plg.DriverId§§nwhere§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate<=:@DateTo and§§n (:@OpAreaId is null or OA.AccountId=:@OpAreaId) and§§n (:@LocationId is null or L.AccountId=:@LocationId)§§norder by§§n T.TransactionDateTime §§n §§n
